name: Michigan
notes:
Michigan has reported each day's negative results since 3/10 but has never totaled them. We sum all the negative results and report the total. Michigan reports specimens tested instead of people tested. 
Recovered counts are updated once a week. 
As of May 16, Michigan uses 'total specimens' reported on lab testing page
As of May 23rd, Michigan separates out antibody and PCR tests. Total testing numbers might be impacted
